name: Deck before Dawn
description:
Is it safe to go to sleep? Or could it turn into a nightmare? Protect yourself from attacking ghosts in this deck building game. Enhance your deck over time by selecting the best rewards.

We thought this jam was a great time to check out the newly released Godot 4! Because of this you might need to use Chrome, any you may be out of luck if you use a Mac. Let us know how you fare.

Tap a card once to select it. If it's an aimed attack like a shoe, then select the enemy to target. For other cards, select the card again to use it. An enemy can attack (A) or move (M). Can you beat the fight without damage? Which upgrades are the best to pick?

It might go without saying, but all of the content in this entry was made by us during Godot wild jam 55. Using Godot, of course :)

We are Nico and Gertjan from Shoe Fisher Games. We are indie developers from the Netherlands who create a little game called WanderOut in our spare time.

If you like this game, let us know by rating it, commenting on it, or by following us on Twitter or Facebook. If we get lots of positive feedback we might continue to make this into a fully featured game.
